projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description:
Develop a comprehensive e-commerce platform with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration.

Key Features:

  • User registration and login
  • Product search and filtering
  • Shopping cart functionality
  • Payment gateway integration
  • Order management system

projects.name: Mobile App Development
projects.description:
Create a cross-platform mobile application for iOS and Android using React Native.

Technical Requirements:

  • React Native framework
  • Redux for state management
  • API integration
  • Push notifications
  • Offline functionality

projects.name: Data Analytics Dashboard
projects.description:
Build an interactive dashboard for data visualization and analytics using modern web technologies.

Features Include:

  • Real-time data visualization
  • Custom chart components
  • Data export functionality
  • User role management
  • Responsive design

projects.name: API Gateway Service
projects.description:
Develop a microservices API gateway to handle routing, authentication, and rate limiting for multiple services.

Core Components:

  • Request routing and load balancing
  • JWT authentication
  • Rate limiting and throttling
  • API documentation
  • Monitoring and logging

projects.name: Content Management System
projects.description:
Create a flexible CMS for managing website content with a user-friendly admin interface.

Key Capabilities:

  • Content creation and editing
  • Media library management
  • User permissions
  • SEO optimization tools
  • Multi-language support
